html:
Sean “Diddy” Combs has been denied bond and will remain in custody he awaits sentencing after being found guilty on two counts of transportation to engage in prostitution.

In his decision to deny bond, Judge Arun Subramanian cited Combs’ history of domestic violence, specifically an incident involving his former girlfriend Cassie Ventura, which was captured on video and shown to the jury.

Combs is facing a maximum of 20 years in prison. He was acquitted of the more serious charges he faced, including racketeering and sex trafficking.
